citeinfo.origin: National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration (NOAA), National Environmental Satellite, Data and Information Service (NESDIS), Office of Satellite Data Processing and Distributing (OSDPD)
citeinfo.title: Sitka CoastWatch Graphics

descript.abstract: This graphics sector file contains one image of graphics for Sitka in the Gulf of Alaska. This file has no header record. Each logical record in this graphics file corresponds to an image row and each word in a logical record corresponds to an image column: the pixels are one byte in length. The number of data records is the same as the number of image rows and the length of the records is the same as the number of columns. Each of the eight bits in a pixel represents an individual graphics plane. The graphics file is used as input by IMGMAP, which overlays the image it produces with the graphics present in the graphics file. This graphics file can be downloaded to any display work station to display graphics.
descript.purpose: To archive graphics for Sitka in the Gulf of Alaska.

distinfo.distliab: While every effort has been made to ensure that these data are accurate and reliable within the limits of the current state of the art, NOAA cannot assume liability for any damages caused by any errors or omissions in the data, nor as a result of the failure of the data to function on a particular system. NOAA makes no warranty, expressed or implied, nor does the fact of distribution constitute such a warranty.

cntaddr.address: NOAA / AFSC / PMEL, 7600 Sand Point Way N.E.
